meanings.sent1: The intended outcome of the project was successfully achieved.
meanings.sent2: She wore her intended dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: The cake turned out to be a funny shape, not quite as intended.
meanings.sent4: His words had an intended effect on her emotions.
meanings.sent5: The intended path led them through the forest, filled with adventure.

meanings.sent1: The intended direction of the arrow was clear.
meanings.sent2: The intended recipient of the letter was her best friend.
meanings.sent3: The cat's intended pounce missed the toy mouse completely.
meanings.sent4: Her gaze was like an intended beam of light, focused and unwavering.
meanings.sent5: The intended message in the bottle reached the shore, delivering hope.

meanings.sent1: The intended purpose of the tool was to fix the broken chair.
meanings.sent2: The intended audience for the movie was families with young children.
meanings.sent3: The dog's intended chew toy ended up being the slipper.
meanings.sent4: The dress was an intended masterpiece of elegance and style.
meanings.sent5: The intended function of the gadget was to make life easier for all.
